storability: Retains 77% alpha acid after 6 months storage at 20 degrees C
resistant_to: Moderately resistant to downy mildew and resistant to verticillium wilt
style_guide: Bitter, Pale Ale, Amber Ale, Porter, India Pale Ale
susceptible_to: Susceptible to prunus necrotic ringspot, apple mosaic virus and hop mosaic virus
name: Eroica
